title: Investment Limited Partnerships (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 31 of 2020) (other
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Investment Limited Partnerships
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Investment Limited Partnerships 

(Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited investment limited partnership (amendment) act 2020 (commencement) order 2021

title: Investment Limited Partnerships (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 31 of 2020) (other
heading: 2. The 1st day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Investment Limited Partnerships (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 31 of 2020) (other 
than sections 27, 28(b), 29, 38, 39, 61 and 63) shall come into operation.
text_norm: 2 1st day february 2021 appointed day investment limited partnership (amendment) act 2020 (no 31 2020) (other section 27 28(b) 29 38 39 61 63) shall come operation

title: Investment Limited Partnerships (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 31 of 2020) (other
heading: 3. The 1st day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections 27,
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections 27, 
28(b), 29, 38, 39, 61 and 63 of the Investment Limited Partnerships 
(Amendment) Act 2020 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 January, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [19] 3
